author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1097 Add a note in the Migration Considerations doc about the 'fixed' serialization behavior and how DetachedStateField can be used to modify the behavior.

author: norman
msg: Use generics to set the type of ids. In the old api it was limited to use long which is not always a good think. For example in JCR the id (uuid) is a String (IMAP-123)
